title: NFL Fines Aaron Rodgers, Green Bay Packers for Covid-19 Violations
sub_head: The modest fines came as the Green Bay Packers star said he takes “full responsibility” for misleading comments falsely stating he had been vaccinated.
body:
The NFL assessed modest fines to the Green Bay Packers and Aaron Rodgers for violations of the league’s Covid-19 protocols in the wake of a firestorm over how the team and the league’s reigning Most Valuable Player handled his vaccination status.
The Packers were fined $300,000 for a handful of protocol violations while Rodgers was docked $14,650, the league said. Rodgers, facing a controversy about his comments on Covid-19 vaccinations, had returned to the radio earlier on Tuesday to partially backtrack on his stance that he hadn’t lied about being vaccinated.
